title: Voidstaff update?
body: When was voidstaff updated? i always read the patch notes and i didnt read about it, did i miss it or was it a hidden update?

replies.body:
Not sure which change in particular you were curious about, but here's a quick list of some recent changes found from wikia.

> V7.22
> Magic penetration increased to 40% from 35%.

> V5.22
> Total cost increased to Gold 2650 from Gold 2500.

> V5.13
> Total cost increased to Gold 2500 from Gold 2295
> Ability power increased to 80 from 70

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yFwExZjQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-20T01:31:37.389+0000)
>
> Not sure which change in particular you were curious about, but here's a quick list of some recent changes found from wikia.

voidstaff was "You ignore 35% of your opponent's magic resistance." now its 40% magic pen, i didnt realise its "%", i got confused because of the description change
